5-X+1=3
5-X+1=2
5-X+1=1

dots<X<=lava

#####
. . .

5-

#+begin_src python :results output
import math
print(math.factorial(5))
#+end_src

#+RESULTS:
: 120

#+begin_src rust :results output
fn main() {
    let lava = 5;
    let dots = 3;
    let mut res = 0;
    for i in dots+1..=lava {
        res += lava - i + 1;
        println!("{}", res);
    }
    println!("{}", res)
}
#+end_src

#+RESULTS:
: 2
: 3
: 3


https://topaz.github.io/paste/#
